coded_answer.p: Thank you very much for your letter. I was really surprised and very happy when I read that I have won the first prize. First, first of all because I have never been to California and second because it's the first time I have ever won something.
The only time that it is possible for me to travel is July, because I am working for a bank and this is the only month I can go on holiday.
For my stay in California I would prefer the accommodation in tents because this gives me a feeling of freedom and adventure and it is quite different to my livelife here in Greece.

The activities I would like motmost to doto do most are climbing and surfing. In my free time I have climbed a lot of mountains in the surrounding area so I can say, that I am quite good inat climbing. But I have never 'surfed' in my livelife, so that is an activity I have to learn.
Last but not least there are some things I would like to know: What kind of wheatherweather do you have in California? Is it very hot? What kind of clothes should I bring with me?
And what about money? How much money Shouldshould I take with me? Are there any activities which are not included? And my last question: how many personspeople are going to stay in each tent.
I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.
